mapper.select: SELECT SEM_YEAR , SEM_NO , SEMESTER FROM SEMSTER

SELECT LEC_NAME , FIRST_TIME , LAST_TIME , DECODE(LEC_DAY, '월', 1, '화', 2, '수', 3, '목', 4, '금', 5) LEC_DAY FROM LECTURE LEC, DEPT, LECTURE_TIME TIME WHERE LEC.DEPT_NO = DEPT.DEPT_NO AND LEC.LEC_NO = TIME.LEC_NO AND #{empNo} = LEC.EMP_NO
SELECT LEC_NAME , LEC_SCORE , COLL_NAME , DEPT_NAME FROM LECTURE LEC, DEPT, COLLEAGE COLL WHERE LEC.DEPT_NO = DEPT.DEPT_NO AND LEC.COLL_NO = COLL.COLL_NO AND EMP_NO = #{empNo}
SELECT DEPT_NAME , DEPT_NO FROM COLLEAGE COLL, DEPT WHERE #{collNo} = DEPT.COLL_NO AND COLL.COLL_NO = DEPT.COLL_NO
